DOC.brief_summary: The aim project evaluate vitro vivo effect dental bleaching agent , carbamide peroxide 16 % ( T1 ) hydrogen peroxide 35 % ( T2 ) together desensitizers/remineralizer agent , Sensodyne® dentifrice ( D1 ) ; experimental dentifrice 7,5 % Biosilicate micro-particles ( D2 ) ; Odontis RX® dentifrice ( D3 ) ; Sorriso® dentifrice ( D4 ) ; Biosilicate micro-particles paste , 1:1 ( D5 ) , Desensebilize Nano P ( D6 ) , bioglass type 45S5 paste , 1:1 ( D7 ) ; GC= distil water , experimental group : T1/D1 ; T1/D2 ; T1/D3 ; T1/D4 ; T1/D5 ; T1/D6 ; T1/D7 ; T1/GC e T2/D1 ; T2/D2 ; T2/D3 ; T2/D4 ; T2/D5 ; T2/D6 ; T2/D7 ; T2/GC . In vitro study , microhardness roughness measurement , image use scan electron microscopy ( SEM ) make sample bovine dental enamel dentin ( 4x4x3mm ; n=10 per group ) treatment bleach gel ( T1= 14 days/ 04 hours/day ; T2=single session ) desensitizers/remineralizer agent . In clinical study , volunteer ( n=10 per group ) evaluate regard dentin hypersensitivity ( DH ) , use visual analogue scale , begin treatment ( T1 T2 ) next 14 day ( 1º , 3º , 7º , 10 º e 14º day ) desensitizers/remineralizer agent ( there´s control group clinical experiment ) apply . Data analyse intra inter-group , statistically .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Desensitizing Agents In-home In-office Dental Bleaching
DOC.detailed_description: Background . Tooth sensitivity ( TS ) common side effect tooth bleaching . The author conduct study evaluate efficiency experimental desensitizing agent reduce TS cause bleach agent . Methods . To test experimental desensitize agent TS cause dental bleaching author select 113 participant without TS randomly treat T1-16 % carbamide peroxide ( 14 day ) T2-35 % hydrogen peroxide ( single session ) . The period study 14 day . Participants ( T1 T2 ) use domestic-use ( DU ) office ( IO ) desensitizers ( D ) : Control Group ; ( DU ) - experimental dentifrice 7,5 % Biosilicate micro-particles- ( D1 ) ; Sensodyne® dentifrice- ( D2 ) ; ( DU ) -Odontis RX Sensiblock® dentifrice- ( D3 ) ; ( IO ) -Biosilicate micro-particles paste , 1:1- ( D4 ) ; ( IO ) -bioglass type 45S5 paste , 1:1 ( D6 ) ; ( IO ) -Desensebilize Nano P- ( D6 ) . On day 1 , 3 , 7 , 10 14 , author receive participant apply IO desensitizers record TS Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) . Data analyze two-way ANOVA ( consider time desensitize factor ) post-hoc Bonferroni test ( α=0.05 ) . Results . The use experimental desensitizing agent G2 G5 cause significantly difference TS compare baseline . TS significantly different G2 use 16 % carbamide peroxide G5 35 % hydrogen peroxide application . Self-perception TS value significantly ( p < 0.001 ) high record VAS . Conclusions . Experimental desensitize agent contain Biosilicate® prevent TS cause bleach agent : dentifrice form associate 16 % carbamide peroxide paste , 35 % hydrogen peroxide use .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients male female , age 18 40 year . 2 . Smokers nonsmoker . 3 . Patients good general health . 4 . Patients good oral health ( change hard soft tissue ) . 5 . Have minimum 24 permanent teeth present restoration anterior teeth . 1 . Patients medical history mark chronic use analgesic , antiinflammatory psychotropic drug . 2 . Patients brace prosthesis restoration anterior teeth . 3 . Patients periodontal disease poor oral hygiene . 4 . Patients prior tooth sensitivity make use desensitize agent last three month . 5 . Patients pregnant nursing . 6 . Patients eat disorder diet acidic . 7 . Systemic condition predispose tooth sensitivity .
